bibl.title: Egyptian and Imported Transport Amphoras.
bibl.note: From the 3rd c. BC to the 4th c. AD.
LAWALL Mark, Egyptian and Imported Transport Amphoras.

S.C. HERBERT and A. BERLIN, with contributions by D.T. ARIEL, T.V. BUTTREY, E. FRIEDLAND, M. LAWALL, R.W. REDDING, and H.T.WRIGHT, Excavations at Coptos (Qift) in Upper Egypt, 1987-1992.
